content: I've actually been listening to a lot of music lately, and I think that's what's motivating me to pick up the guitar again. I've been exploring different genres, including indie rock, electronic, and hip-hop. I recently discovered Tame Impala and have been listening to their album "Slow Rush" non-stop. Do you think any of these genres or artists can influence my guitar playing style or the type of music I'll want to play?
